hostInstitution.hiShortDesc: The University of Pretoria (UP), situated in the administrative capital of South Africa, Pretoria, is is over 110 years old and strives to be the African global university. UP is the largest contact university in the country with over 55 000 students, 10 faculties, the country and continent's top business school, veterinary school, and law school.
hostInstitution.hiDescription: The Albert Luthuli Leadership Institute (ALLI) at the University of Pretoria is the host of the SDSN South Africa national network.
